title: Winter evening tales.
author: Barr, Amelia Edith Huddleston
snippet: You ken whether she has bid your price or not. When you hae served your twa years I'se buy you a ,20,000 share in the Gordon Bank, and a man wi' ,20,000 can pick and choose the wife he likes best. But i'm aboon bribing you a fair offer isna a bribe.
